title: What are some of the newer startups throughout the world where your money is worth investing in? - Quora

response.answer_text: Google’s driverless delivery startup - I don’t remember its name, sorry. it eliminates labour cost. you can deliver more in a single run. Logistics is a very place to invest your money as you don’t know what product(maybe they can compete with uber eats) could be delivered. So it has a great potential. Currently this one is what makes me think. I’ll edit later if i remember other good companies that are emerging. But if you are a person who isn’t an angel investor or a venture capitalist, you cannot invest in start-ups as these companies are of high risk. They are kept out of reach by SEC(U.S.A’s SEBI counterpart) And Indian Securities Regulator SEBI from hands of common people that don’t have a lot(in millions) of money due to the fact it requires millions of money injections in these companies to grow and we would have nothing to survive if our bucks go away forever. I hope it helps.
